function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on facial recognition technology for mask detection","Impact":"Inaccurate detection or false positives leading to incorrect enforcement actions or overlooking non-compliance","Mitigation":"Combine with other detection methods (e.g., temperature screening) to validate mask detection results","Technologies":"Combining facial recognition with temperature screening technology","People":"City authorities, law enforcement, general public","Owner":"City authorities, technology developers"},{"Description":"Privacy and surveillance concerns with CCTV camera use","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, potential misuse of CCTV footage, and public backlash","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy policies, anonymize data, and communicate the purpose of CCTV use to the public","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques for CCTV footage, data privacy regulations","People":"General public, privacy advocacy groups","Owner":"City authorities, privacy regulators"},{"Description":"Dependency on IoT sensors for data collection","Impact":"Disruption of data collection and system functionality in case of sensor malfunctions or network issues","Mitigation":"Redundant sensor deployment, regular maintenance checks, and alternative data collection methods","Technologies":"Redundant sensor networks, predictive maintenance for IoT sensors","People":"City authorities, technology maintenance teams","Owner":"City authorities, technology maintenance teams"}]}
